content: I knew Bill would make the sensible choice to narrow it to Russ and Harden, even if he made the wrong final choice. Who owned this season? It was Russ and, oh yeah, those 67-win Warriors, then all the young bigs, then Isaiah and Harden and Freak in some order. LeBron was further down the list unless “rest” is what he owned, and Kawhi was an afterthought.
